00278 class c_mb_list_model : public gcn::ListModel
00279 {
00280     private:
00281         int number_of_elements;
00282         vector <string> elements;
00283 
00284     public:
00285         c_mb_list_model()
00286         {
00287             this->number_of_elements = 0;
00288         }
00289 
00290         void add_element(string p_name)
00291         {
00292             this->elements.push_back(p_name);
00293             this->number_of_elements++;
00294         }
00295 
00296 //      bool remove_element(int);
00297 
00298         std::string getElementAt(int i)
00299         {
00300             if (i < this->number_of_elements)
00301             {
00302                 return elements[i];
00303             }
00304 
00305             return "error";
00306         }
00307 
00308         int getNumberOfElements()
00309         {
00310             return elements.size();
00311         }
00312 };
